mapper.select: SELECT csp.*, img.product_image AS images, CONCAT('￥', sku.min_price, '~￥', sku.max_price) AS section, sku.sku_id FROM cere_recommend_relation crr INNER JOIN cere_shop_product csp ON crr.product_id = csp.product_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, ANY_VALUE(product_image) AS product_image FROM cere_product_image GROUP BY product_id ) img ON csp.product_id = img.product_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT product_id, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(sku_id) AS sku_id FROM cere_product_sku GROUP BY product_id ) sku ON crr.product_id = sku.product_id WHERE crr.recommend_id = #{recommendId} GROUP BY csp.product_id
